# qu_genre
***

```{r}
qu_genre <- dbGetQuery(con,"
select
	distinct(qu_genre_code),
	qu_genre
from
	processed.profilemaster
group by
	qu_genre_code,
	qu_genre;
")

qu_genre %>% 
  kable()
```

# 回答タイプ
***
- SA: 1つ選んでください
- MA: 複数選択可


# genre_code1 フェース項目
***
```{r}
q1 <- dbGetQuery(con,"
select
	distinct(question_code),
	question
from
	processed.profilemaster
where
	qu_genre_code = 1
group by
	question_code,
	question;
")

q1 %>% 
  kable()
```

# genre_code3 意識項目 {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}
***

## 生活者タイプ
  
- MA    
- 4.2~4.5を「当てはまるものに～」形式で回答させている.
```{r}
q31 <- dbGetQuery(con,"
select
	distinct(question_code),
	question,
	answer_code,
	answer
from
	processed.profilemaster
where
	qu_genre_code = 3 and
	question_code >=1 and
	question_code <=3	
group by
	question_code,
	question,
	question_type,
	answer_code,
	answer;

")
```
